00008 #ifndef P_CHANNEL_H_
00009 #define P_CHANNEL_H_
00010 
00011 /* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *
00012  * Particle channel class definition. The particle channel is a sub-channel of a *
00013  * momentum channel, sampling the invariant mass acoording to the type of        *
00014  * particle propagating through the channel. If the particle type is not defined *
00015  * (multi-particle invariant masses), the sampling is performed by a power-law.  *
00016  * Adaptive grids may be overlayed to optimise the propagator sampling.          *
00017  *                                                                               *
00018  * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * */
00019 
00020 #include <list>
00021 #include <limits>
00022 #include <Camorra/bit_string.h>
00023 #include <Camorra/particle.h>
00024 #include <Camorra/flav_comp.h>
00025 #include <Camgen/logging.h>
00026 #include <Camgen/static_conf.h>
00027 #include <Camgen/ps_decl.h>
00028 #include <Camgen/MC_gen.h>
00029 #include <Camgen/sgen_grid.h>
00030 
00031 namespace Camorra

00033 
00034     /* Integrates the s-densities within the allowed phase space: */
00035 
00036     template<class model_t,std::size_t N_in,std::size_t N_out,class rng_t>typename model_t::value_type integrate(const particle_channel<model_t,N_in,N_out,rng_t>*,const particle_channel<model_t,N_in,N_out,rng_t>*,const typename model_t::value_type&);
00037     
00038     /* Phase space particle channel class: */
00039 
00040     template<class model_t,std::size_t N_in,std::size_t N_out,class rng_t>class particle_channel: public MC_generator<typename model_t::value_type>
00041     {
00042         friend typename model_t::value_type integrate<model_t,N_in,N_out,rng_t>(const particle_channel<model_t,N_in,N_out,rng_t>*,const particle_channel<model_t,N_in,N_out,rng_t>*,const typename model_t::value_type&);
00043         friend class momentum_channel<model_t,N_in,N_out,rng_t>;
00044         friend class ps_factory<model_t,N_in,N_out,rng_t,typename model_t::spacetime_type>;
00045         friend class ps_tree<model_t,N_in,N_out,rng_t>;
00046         typedef MC_generator<typename model_t::value_type> base_type;
00047 
00048         public:
00049 
00050             /* Type definitions: */
00051 
00052             typedef model_t model_type;
00053             typedef typename get_spacetime_type<model_t>::type spacetime_type;
00054             typedef typename model_t::value_type value_type;
00055             typedef vector<typename model_t::value_type,model_t::dimension> momentum_type;
00056             typedef std::size_t size_type;
00057             typedef rng_t rn_engine;
00058             typedef random_number_stream<value_type,rng_t> rn_stream;
00059             typedef momentum_channel<model_t,N_in,N_out,rng_t> momentum_channel_type;
00060             typedef ps_branching<model_t,N_in,N_out,rng_t> branching_type;
00061             typedef s_generator<value_type,rng_t> s_generator_type;
00062             typedef BW_s_generator<value_type,rng_t> Breit_Wigner_type;
00063             typedef pl_s_generator<value_type,rng_t> power_law_type;
00064             typedef uni_s_generator<value_type,rng_t> uniform_type;
00065             typedef Dd_s_generator<value_type,rng_t> Dirac_delta_type;
00066             static const std::size_t N_bits=N_in+N_out-1;           
00067             typedef bit_string<N_bits> bit_string_type;
00068

00070             /*----------------------*/

00073 
00074             const particle<model_t>* const particle_type;
00075

00077 
00078             const std::string name;
00079 
00080             /* Dirac delta generation flag: */
00081 
00082             const bool Dirac_delta;

00087             virtual ~particle_channel()
00088             {
00089                 delete s_gen;
00090             }

00092             /* Public modifiers: */
00093             /*-------------------*/

00095             /* Sets the minimal invariant mass-squared. */
00096             
00097             bool set_s_min(const value_type& smin)
00098             {
00099                 return s_gen->set_s_min(std::max(ps_channel->s_min_min(),smin));
00100             }
00101 
00102             /* Sets the minimal minimal invariant mass-squared. */
00103             
00104             bool set_s_min_min(const value_type& sminmin)
00105             {
00106                 bool q=s_gen->set_s_min_min(sminmin);
00107                 if(sminmin>this->s_min())
00108                 {
00109                     q&=(s_gen->set_s_min(sminmin));
00110                 }
00111                 return q;
00112             }
00113 
00114             /* Sets the minimal signed invariant mass. */
00115             
00116             bool set_m_min(const value_type& mmin)
00117             {
00118                 return s_gen->set_m_min(std::max(ps_channel->m_min_min(),mmin));
00119             }
00120 
00121             /* Sets the maximal invariant mass-squared. */
00122             
00123             bool set_s_max(const value_type& smax)
00124             {
00125                 return s_gen->set_s_max(std::min(ps_channel->s_max_max(),smax));
00126             }
00127 
00128             /* Sets the maximal maximal invariant mass-squared. */
00129             
00130             bool set_s_max_max(const value_type& smaxmax)
00131             {
00132                 bool q=s_gen->set_s_max_max(smaxmax);
00133                 if(smaxmax<this->s_max())
00134                 {
00135                     q&=s_gen->set_s_max(smaxmax);
00136                 }
00137                 return q;
00138             }
00139 
00140             /* Sets the maximal signed invariant mass. */
00141             
00142             bool set_m_max(const value_type& mmax)
00143             {
00144                 return s_gen->set_m_max(std::min(ps_channel->m_max_max(),mmax));
00145             }
00146 
00147             /* Sets the invariant mass-squared range. */
00148             
00149             bool set_s_range(const value_type& smin,const value_type& smax)
00150             {
00151                 if(s_gen->set_s_range(std::max(ps_channel->s_min_min(),smin),std::min(ps_channel->s_max_max(),smax)))
00152                 {
00153                     return true;
00154                 }
00155                 return false;
00156             }
00157 
00158             /* Sets the invariant mass range. */
00159             
00160             bool set_m_range(const value_type& mmin,const value_type& mmax)
00161             {
00162                 return s_gen->set_m_range(std::max(ps_channel->m_min_min(),mmin),std::min(ps_channel->m_max_max(),mmax));
00163             }
00164 
00165             /* Sets the multichannel adaptivity and threshold to the argument
00166              * pair: */
00167 
00168             void set_multichannel_params(const std::pair<value_type,value_type>& x)
00169             {
00170                 adaptivity=&(x.first);
00171                 threshold=&(x.second);
00172             }
00173 
00174             /* Recursively picks a channel according to the multichannel weight of the
00175              * branchings, stores the selected branching in the argument vector,
00176              * and proceeds down the tree. Returns false upon failure. */
00177 
00178             bool choose_branching(std::vector<branching_type*>& b)
00179             {
00180                 generation_flag=true;
00181                 if(branchings.size()==0)
00182                 {
00183                     return true;
00184                 }
00185                 if(branchings.size()==1)
00186                 {
00187                     branching_iterator=branchings.begin();
00188                     b.push_back(*branching_iterator);
00189                     (*branching_iterator)->choose_channel(b);
00190                     return true;
00191                 }
00192                 else
00193                 {
00194                     branching_iterator=branchings.begin();
00195                     value_type rho=rn_stream::throw_number();
00196                     value_type r(0);
00197                     while(r<rho and branching_iterator!=branchings.end())
00198                     {
00199                         r+=((*branching_iterator)->alpha);
00200                         ++branching_iterator;
00201                     }
00202                     --branching_iterator;
00203                 }
00204                 if(branching_iterator==branchings.end())
00205                 {
00206                     LOG(warning)<<"Multichannel weights incorrectly normalized: channel iterator overflow encountered."<<ENDLOG(warning);
00207                     b.clear();
00208                     return false;
00209                 }
00210                 b.push_back(*branching_iterator);
00211                 return (*branching_iterator)->choose_channel(b);
00212             }
00213 
00214             /* Calls the selected branching generation method. */
00215 
00216             bool generate()
00217             {
00218                 if(branchings.size()==0)
00219                 {
00220                     return true;
00221                 }
00222                 return (*branching_iterator)->generate();
00223             }
00224 
00225             /* Generates the incoming invariant mass. */
00226 
00227             bool generate_s()
00228             {
00229                 if(s_gen->generate())
00230                 {
00231                     ps_channel->evaluate_m();
00232                     return true;
00233                 }
00234                 return false;
00235             }
00236 
00237             /* Evaluates the weight of the invariant mass generation. */
00238 
00239             bool evaluate_s_weight()
00240             {
00241                 return s_gen->evaluate_weight();
00242             }
00243 
00244             /* Retruns whether the s-generation is normalisable: */
00245 
00246             bool s_normalisable()
00247             {
00248                 return s_gen->normalisable();
00249             }
00250 
00251             /* Normalisation checking utility: */
00252 
00253             std::ostream& check_s_norm(std::ostream& os) const
00254             {
00255                 if(!s_gen->normalisable())
00256                 {
00257                     os<<"in particle channel "<<name<<": s-gen "<<s_gen->detailed_type();
00258                     os<<" not normalisable within ["<<s_gen->s_min()<<','<<s_gen->s_max()<<"]..."<<std::endl;
00259                 }
00260                 return os;
00261             }
00262 
00263             /* Returns the weight corresponding to the generated incoming
00264              * invariant mass. */
00265 
00266             const value_type& s_weight() const
00267             {
00268                 return s_gen->weight();
00269             }
00270 
00271             /* Weight evaluation method. */
00272 
00273             bool evaluate_weight()
00274             {
00275                 if(branchings.size()==0)
00276                 {
00277                     this->weight()=(value_type)1;
00278                     return true;
00279                 }
00280                 value_type g(0);
00281                 for(typename std::list<branching_type*>::iterator it=branchings.begin();it!=branchings.end();++it)
00282                 {
00283                     if((*it)->alpha!=(value_type)0)
00284                     {
00285                         if(!(*it)->evaluate_weight())
00286                         {
00287                             this->weight()=(value_type)0;
00288                             return false;
00289                         }
00290                         g+=((*it)->alpha/(*it)->weight());
00291                     }
00292                 }
00293                 this->weight()=(value_type)1/g;
00294                 return true;
00295             }
00296 
00297             /* Resets the generation flag. */
00298 
00299             void reset_generation_flags()
00300             {
00301                 generation_flag=false;
00302                 if(branching_iterator!=branchings.end())
00303                 {
00304                     (*branching_iterator)->reset_generation_flags();
00305                 }
00306             }
00307 
00308             /* Refreshes the estimators of the individual channels. */
00309 
00310             void update()
00311             {
00312                 if(this->weight()==(value_type)0)
00313                 {
00314                     return;
00315                 }
00316                 if(branchings.size()>1)
00317                 {
00318                     value_type w3=std::pow(this->integrand(),(int)2)*(this->weight());
00319                     if(w3!=(value_type)0)
00320                     {
00321                         multichannel_flag=true;
00322                     }
00323                     for(typename std::list<branching_type*>::iterator it=branchings.begin();it!=branchings.end();++it)
00324                     {
00325                         if((*it)->alpha!=(value_type)0 and (*it)->weight()!=(value_type)0)
00326                         {
00327                             (*it)->W+=(w3/(*it)->weight());
00328                         }
00329                     }
00330                 }
00331                 ++update_counter;
00332                 s_gen->integrand()=this->integrand();
00333                 s_gen->update_weight();
00334             }
00335 
00336             /* Adapts the multichannel weights. */
00337 
00338             void adapt_channels()
00339             {
00340                 if(branchings.size()>1 and multichannel_flag)
00341                 {
00342                     value_type D(0);
00343                     for(typename std::list<branching_type*>::iterator it1=branchings.begin();it1!=branchings.end();++it1)
00344                     {
00345                         if((*it1)->alpha!=(value_type)0)
00346                         {
00347                             (*it1)->W/=update_counter;
00348                             for(typename std::list<branching_type*>::iterator it2=branchings.begin();it2!=it1;++it2)
00349                             {
00350                                 if((*it2)->alpha!=(value_type)0)
00351                                 {
00352                                     D=std::max(D,std::abs((*it1)->W-(*it2)->W));
00353                                 }
00354                             }
00355                         }
00356                     }
00357                     value_type norm(0),beta((value_type)0.5*multichannel_adaptivity());
00358                     for(typename std::list<branching_type*>::iterator it=branchings.begin();it!=branchings.end();++it)
00359                     {
00360                         if((*it)->alpha!=(value_type)0)
00361                         {
00362                             (*it)->alpha*=std::pow((*it)->W,beta);
00363                             norm+=(*it)->alpha;
00364                         }
00365                     }
00366                     value_type thresh=multichannel_threshold()*norm;
00367                     value_type normbis(0);
00368                     for(typename std::list<branching_type*>::iterator it=branchings.begin();it!=branchings.end();++it)
00369                     {
00370                         if((*it)->alpha<thresh/branchings.size())
00371                         {
00372                             (*it)->alpha=(value_type)0;
00373                         }
00374                         normbis+=(*it)->alpha;
00375                     }
00376                     for(typename std::list<branching_type*>::iterator it=branchings.begin();it!=branchings.end();++it)
00377                     {
00378                         if((*it)->alpha!=(value_type)0)
00379                         {
00380                             (*it)->alpha/=normbis;
00381                         }
00382                         (*it)->W=(value_type)0;
00383                     }
00384                     branchings.sort(branching_ordering);
00385                 }
00386                 update_counter=0;
00387                 multichannel_flag=false;
00388             }
00389 
00390             /* Sorts the branchings descending in multichannel weight: */
00391 
00392             void sort_branchings()
00393             {
00394                 value_type norm(0);
00395                 for(typename std::list<branching_type*>::iterator it=branchings.begin();it!=branchings.end();++it)
00396                 {
00397                     norm+=(*it)->alpha;
00398                 }
00399                 if(!(norm>(value_type)0))
00400                 {
00401                     value_type a=(value_type)1/branchings.size();
00402                     for(typename std::list<branching_type*>::iterator it=branchings.begin();it!=branchings.end();++it)
00403                     {
00404                         (*it)->alpha=a;
00405                     }
00406                 }
00407                 else
00408                 {
00409                     for(typename std::list<branching_type*>::iterator it=branchings.begin();it!=branchings.end();++it)
00410                     {
00411                         (*it)->alpha/=norm;
00412                     }
00413                     branchings.sort(branching_ordering);
00414                 }
00415             }
00416 
00417             /* Adapts the vegas grids: */
00418 
00419             void adapt_grids()
00420             {
00421                 s_gen->adapt();
00422             }
00423 
00424             /* Adapts multichannel weights and vegas grids: */
00425 
00426             void adapt()
00427             {
00428                 adapt_grids();
00429                 adapt_channels();
00430             }
00431 
00432             /* Resets cross sections, adaptive grids and multichannel weights:
00433              * */
00434 
00435             void reset()
00436             {
00437                 this->base_type::reset();
00438                 for(typename std::list<branching_type*>::iterator it=branchings.begin();it!=branchings.end();++it)
00439                 {
00440                     (*it)->W=(value_type)0;
00441                     (*it)->alpha=(value_type)1/branchings.size();
00442                     (*it)->reset();
00443                 }
00444                 generation_flag=false;
00445                 update_counter=0;
00446                 multichannel_flag=false;
00447                 s_gen->reset();
00448             }
00449             
00450             static bool redundant_branching(const branching_type* c)
00451             {
00452                 return c->is_redundant();
00453             }
00454 
00455             /* Throws out all branchings that have zero multichannel weight. */
00456 
00457             void clean()
00458             {
00459                 if(generation_flag)
00460                 {
00461                     reset_generation_flags();
00462                 }
00463                 branchings.remove_if(redundant_branching);
00464                 branching_iterator=branchings.begin();
00465             }

00662             /* Multichannel adaptivity: */
00663 
00664             value_type multichannel_adaptivity() const
00665             {
00666                 return (adaptivity==NULL)?(value_type)1:(*adaptivity);
00667             }
00668 
00669             /* Multichannel threshold: */
00670 
00671             value_type multichannel_threshold() const
00672             {
00673                 if(threshold==NULL)
00674                 {
00675                     return (value_type)0;
00676                 }
00677                 if(*threshold<(value_type)0)
00678                 {
00679                     return (value_type)0;
00680                 }
00681                 if(*threshold>(value_type)1)
00682                 {
00683                     return (value_type)1;
00684                 }
00685                 return *threshold;
00686             }
00687 
00688             /* Printing method. */
00689             
00690             std::ostream& print(std::ostream& os) const
00691             {
00692                 if(particle_type!=NULL)
00693                 {
00694                     os<<std::setw(10)<<particle_type->get_name();
00695                 }
00696                 else
00697                 {
00698                     os<<std::setw(10)<<"X";
00699                 }
00700                 if(branchings.size()!=0)
00701                 {
00702                     typename std::list<branching_type*>::const_iterator it=branchings.begin();
00703                     os<<"  --->  ";
00704                     (*it)->print(os);
00705                     os<<std::endl;
00706                     ++it;
00707                     for(;it!=branchings.end();++it)
00708                     {
00709                         os<<std::setw(10)<<' ';
00710                         os<<"  --->  ";
00711                         (*it)->print(os);
00712                         os<<std::endl;
00713                     }
00714                     os<<std::setw(12)<<' ';
00715                 }
00716                 else
00717                 {
00718                     os<<std::setw(2)<<' ';
00719                 }
00720                 os<<"recursive weight:"<<this->weight()<<", s generator type: "<<s_gen->detailed_type()<<std::endl;
00721                 return os;
00722             }
00723 
00724             /* Other printing method: */
00725 
00726             std::ostream& shortprint(std::ostream& os) const
00727             {
00728                 os<<name<<", p = "<<p()<<", m = "<<m()<<", [m--,m++] = ["<<this->m_min_min()<<','<<this->m_max_max()<<"], w = "<<this->weight();
00729                 return os;
00730             }
00731 
00732             /* Returns the redundancy flag. */
00733 
00734             bool is_redundant() const
00735             {
00736                 return redundant;
00737             }
00738 
00739             /* Recursively sets the redundant flag: */
00740             
00741             void set_redundant()
00742             {
00743                 redundant=true;
00744             }
00745 
00746             /* Recursively unsets the redundant flag: */
00747             
00748             void unset_redundant()
00749             {
00750                 redundant=false;
00751                 for(typename std::list<branching_type*>::iterator it=branchings.begin();it!=branchings.end();++it)
00752                 {
00753                     if((*it)->alpha>(value_type)0)
00754                     {
00755                         (*it)->unset_redundant();
00756                     }
00757                 }
00758             }
00759 
00760             /* Warning utility: */
00761 
00762             void s_warning() const
00763             {
00764                 if(!s_gen->normalisable())
00765                 {
00766                     LOG(warning)<<"\ns-sampler "<<s_gen->detailed_type()<<" not normalizable within ["<<s_gen->m_min()<<','<<s_gen->m_max()<<"] in channel\n"<<*this<<ENDLOG(warning);
00767                 }
00768             }
00769 
00770             /* Serialization: */
00771             /*----------------*/
00772 
00773             /* Loads the instance from input stream: */
00774 
00775             std::istream& load(std::istream& is)
00776             {
00777                 this->base_type::load(is);
00778                 is>>update_counter>>multichannel_flag;
00779                 return is;
00780             }
00781 
00782             /* Writes the instance to the output stream: */
00783 
00784             std::ostream& save(std::ostream& os) const
00785             {
00786                 os<<"<particle>"<<std::endl;
00787                 std::string str=(particle_type==NULL)?"X":particle_type->get_name();
00788                 os<<str<<"\t"<<nu<<"\t"<<redundant<<std::endl;
00789                 s_gen->save(os);
00790                 this->base_type::save(os);
00791                 os<<update_counter<<"\t"<<multichannel_flag<<std::endl;
00792                 os<<"</particle>"<<std::endl;
00793                 return os;
00794             }
00795 
00796         private:
00797 
00798             /* Private types: */
00799             /*----- ----------*/
00800 
00801             class same_branching
00802             {
00803                 public:
00804 
00805                     const branching_type* const b;
00806 
00807                     same_branching(const branching_type* b_):b(b_){}
00808                     bool operator()(const branching_type* other) const
00809                     {
00810                         return b->equiv(other);
00811                     }
00812             };
00813 
00814             /* Private static functions: */
00815             /*---------------------------*/
00816 
00817             /* Inspects whether the momentum channel induces a Dirac-delta-like particle
00818              * channel: */
00819 
00820             static std::string make_channel_name(const particle<model_t>* phi,const bit_string_type p)
00821             {
00822                 std::stringstream ss;
00823                 if(phi==NULL)
00824                 {
00825                     ss<<"X("<<p<<')';
00826                 }
00827                 else
00828                 {
00829                     ss<<phi->get_name()<<'('<<p<<')';
00830                 }
00831                 return ss.str();
00832             }
00833             static bool is_Dirac_delta(const momentum_channel_type* c,const value_type* E)
00834             {
00835                 return (c->on_shell() or (c->timelike() and (c->bitstring.count()==N_out) and (E!=NULL)));
00836             }
00837             static bool branching_ordering(const branching_type* first,const branching_type* second)
00838             {
00839                 return (first->alpha>second->alpha);
00840             }
00841 
00842             /* Private data members: */
00843             /*-----------------------*/
00844 
00845             /* Momentum channel: */
00846 
00847             momentum_channel_type* const ps_channel;
00848 
00849             /* Invariant mass generator: */
00850 
00851             s_generator_type* s_gen;
00852 
00853             /* Power-law exponent: */
00854 
00855             value_type nu;
00856 
00857             /* Branchings starting at this channel: */
00858             
00859             std::list<branching_type*>branchings;
00860 
00861             /* Sampled branching by the multichannel: */
00862 
00863             typename std::list<branching_type*>::iterator branching_iterator;
00864             
00865             /* Update counters: */
00866             
00867             size_type update_counter;
00868 
00869             /* Flag setting nonzero multichannel weight estimators: */
00870 
00871             bool multichannel_flag;
00872 
00873             /* Generation flag: */
00874 
00875             bool& generation_flag;
00876 
00877             /* Cleaning flag: */
00878 
00879             bool redundant;
00880 
00881             /* Multichannel adaptivity: */
00882 
00883             const value_type* adaptivity;
00884 
00885             /* Multichannel threshold: */
00886 
00887             const value_type* threshold;
00888 
00889             /* Private constructors: */
00890             /*-----------------------*/
00891 
00892             /* Momentum-allocating constructor. */
00893 
00894             particle_channel(momentum_channel_type* ps_channel_,const particle<model_t>* particle_type_,const value_type* Ecmhat=NULL):particle_type(particle_type_),name(make_channel_name(particle_type_,ps_channel_->bitstring)),Dirac_delta(is_Dirac_delta(ps_channel_,Ecmhat)),ps_channel(ps_channel_),s_gen(NULL),nu(0),branching_iterator(branchings.end()),update_counter(0),multichannel_flag(false),generation_flag(ps_channel_->generation_flag),redundant(true),adaptivity(NULL),threshold(NULL)
00895             {
00896                 value_type* s=&(ps_channel->invariant_mass);
00897                 bool adaptive=false;
00898                 bool total_s=(ps_channel_->timelike() and ps_channel_->bitstring.count()==N_out);
00899                 s_generator<value_type,rng_t>* tempgen;
00900                 const value_type* mass=(particle_type==NULL)?(NULL):(particle_type->get_mass_address());
00901                 if(on_shell())
00902                 {
00903                     tempgen=new Dirac_delta_type(s,mass);
00904                     adaptive=false;
00905                 }
00906                 else if(total_s and Ecmhat!=NULL)
00907                 {
00908                     tempgen=new Dirac_delta_type(s,Ecmhat);
00909                     adaptive=false;
00910                 }
00911                 else if(particle_type==NULL)
00912                 {
00913                     adaptive=(ps_channel->timelike())?adaptive_s_sampling():adaptive_t_sampling();
00914                     if(total_s)
00915                     {
00916                         nu=shat_exponent();
00917                     }
00918                     else
00919                     {
00920                         nu=auxiliary_exponent();
00921                     }
00922                     if(nu==(value_type)0)
00923                     {
00924                         tempgen=new uniform_type(s);
00925                     }
00926                     else
00927                     {
00928                         tempgen=new power_law_type(s,NULL,&nu);
00929                     }
00930                 }
00931                 else
00932                 {
00933                     adaptive=(ps_channel->timelike())?adaptive_s_sampling():adaptive_t_sampling();
00934                     const value_type* mass=particle_type->get_mass_address();
00935                     const value_type* width=particle_type->get_width_address();
00936                     if(particle_type->is_auxiliary())
00937                     {
00938                         tempgen=new uniform_type(s);
00939                     }
00940                     else if(spacelike() or (width==NULL))
00941                     {
00942                         nu=spacelike()?spacelike_exponent(particle_type->get_name()):timelike_exponent(particle_type->get_name());
00943                         tempgen=new power_law_type(s,mass,&nu);
00944                     }
00945                     else
00946                     {
00947                         tempgen=new Breit_Wigner_type(s,mass,width);
00948                     }
00949                 }
00950                 if(adaptive)
00951                 {
00952                     s_gen=new adaptive_s_generator<value_type,rng_t>(s,tempgen,grid_bins(),grid_mode());
00953                 }
00954                 else
00955                 {
00956                     s_gen=tempgen;
00957                     if(Dirac_delta)
00958                     {
00959                         set_m_min((mass==NULL)?0:(*mass));
00960                         set_m_max((mass==NULL)?0:(*mass));
00961                     }
00962                 }
00963             }
00964 
00965             /* Private modifiers: */
00966             /*--------------------*/
00967 
00968             /* Adds a branching instance to the multichannel: */
00969 
00970             branching_type* insert_branching(branching_type* br)
00971             {
00972                 if(ps_channel->bitstring.count()==1)
00973                 {
00974                     LOG(warning)<<"Attempt to attach phase space branching to external channel ignored."<<ENDLOG(warning);
00975                     return NULL;
00976                 }
00977                 if(branchings.size()==0)
00978                 {
00979                     branchings.push_back(br);
00980                     br->alpha=(value_type)1;
00981                     return br;
00982                 }
00983                 same_branching pred(br);
00984                 typename std::list<branching_type*>::iterator it=std::find_if(branchings.begin(),branchings.end(),pred);
00985                 if(it==branchings.end())
00986                 {
00987                     branchings.push_back(br);
00988                     value_type alpha=(value_type)1/branchings.size();
00989                     for(typename std::list<branching_type*>::iterator it2=branchings.begin();it2!=branchings.end();++it2)
00990                     {
00991                         (*it2)->alpha=alpha;
00992                     }
00993                     return br;
00994                 }
00995                 delete br;
00996                 return *it;
00997             }
00998     };
00999     template<class model_t,std::size_t N_in,std::size_t N_out,class rng_t>const std::size_t particle_channel<model_t,N_in,N_out,rng_t>::N_bits;
01000 
01001     /* Output stream overload: */
01002 
01003     template<class model_t,std::size_t N_in,std::size_t N_out,class rng_t>std::ostream& operator << (std::ostream& os,const particle_channel<model_t,N_in,N_out,rng_t>& c)
01004     {
01005         return c.shortprint(os);
01006     }
01007 
01008     /* Particle channel comparison class implementation: */
01009 
01010     template<class model_t,std::size_t N_in,std::size_t N_out,class rng_t>class particle_channel_comp
01011     {
01012         public:
01013 
01014             typedef particle_channel<model_t,N_in,N_out,rng_t> value_type;
01015 
01016             flavour_comp< particle<model_t> > particle_comp;
01017 
01018             particle_channel_comp(){}
01019             bool operator ()(const value_type& a,const value_type& b) const
01020             {
01021                 return (a.bitstring()==b.bitstring())?(particle_comp(a.particle_type,b.particle_type)):(a.bitstring()<b.bitstring());
01022             }
01023             bool operator ()(const value_type* a,const value_type* b) const
01024             {
01025                 return (a->bitstring()==b->bitstring())?(particle_comp(a->particle_type,b->particle_type)):(a->bitstring()<b->bitstring());
01026             }
01027     };
01028 
01029     template<class model_t,std::size_t N_in,std::size_t N_out,class rng_t>typename model_t::value_type integrate(const particle_channel<model_t,N_in,N_out,rng_t>* first,const particle_channel<model_t,N_in,N_out,rng_t>* second,const typename model_t::value_type& sqrts)
01030     {
01031         return integrate<typename model_t::value_type,rng_t>(first->s_gen,second->s_gen,sqrts);
01032     }
01033 }
